question: Investigate the treatment and management of a non-infectious disease.

sample_answer.full_answer: The treatment and management of a non-infectious disease, such as type 2 diabetes, typically involves a combination of lifestyle changes and medication (1 mark). Lifestyle changes may include eating a healthy diet, exercising regularly, and maintaining a healthy weight (2 marks). Medication may include oral hypoglycemic agents or insulin injections (2 marks).

marking_criteria.criteria: Describes the lifestyle changes that can be used to manage the disease.
Describes the medications that can be used to manage the disease.
